info.description: Khweeteur is a small twitter client for Maemo and MeeGo. It showing DMs, mentions, searchs, lists, and the follower timeline in one window. Maemo's notification system is supported and can notify for dmsse or mentions even when the ui is not launched, as is auto-update and themeing.
info.name: khweeteur
info.summary: A twitter client for Maemo and MeeGo.
info.html_description: Khweeteur is a small twitter client for Maemo and MeeGo. It showing DMs, mentions, searchs, lists, and the follower timeline in one window. Maemo’s notification system is supported and can notify for dmsse or mentions even when the ui is not launched, as is auto-update and themeing.
